overview:
Tim Koschella is CMO and Co-Founder at HitFox Game Ventures.

Before starting HitFox.com and HitFox Game Ventures, Tim acted as Founder and Managing Director of Leipzig based eLearning startup lecturio.de (where he now is a partner) and as Interim-CFO at Berlin based sports apparel online retailer mysportgroup.de.

He holds a Master Degree in Business & Economics from HHL - Leipzig Graduate School of Management. Prior to HHL, Tim studied at University of Mainz and Universidad del Pacifico in Quito/Ecuador.
